channel.title: Need help making an item owner only
channel.description: i need helpign making granite mauls owner only because i want them to have unlim. spec please help me

item.title: Need help making an item owner only
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

omfg i thought thats what you were asking

can you not do stuff for yourself? if you want only the owner can use it then change the playerRights <= 0 to playerRights <= 2

Read full topic

item.title: Need help making an item owner only
item.dc:creator: @sordsmen123 sordsmen123
item.description:
@sordsmen123 wrote:

when i put this—if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4153) && playerRights <= 0) {
sendMessage(“You must be a mod or admin to weild this.”);
remove(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] , playerWeapon);
} every 1 can use but player rights 0

item.title: Need help making an item owner only
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

Milk the code is if playerrights is less then 2 then remove the gmaul but if we put > then it’ll be if playerrights is more then 2 remove it so it’ll remove it when the owner is wearing it but not when normal players are wearing it

Read full topic

item.title: Need help making an item owner only
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

[quote=“Milk and Java™, post:28, topic:172238”]I know what it does.

If you equip it and you don’t have rights 3 or higher, it sends a message and doesnt equip it. If you are though, it will just update();, I just needed something to fill between the { }[/quote]

no actually it will update() if your rights are <=3 and it will send the message even if your rights are 3

sordsmen just use the code i posted on the first page, or use delta’s. milk has no idea what he is talking about

Read full topic

item.title: Need help making an item owner only
item.dc:creator: @sordsmen123 sordsmen123
item.description:
@sordsmen123 wrote:

i did this–if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4153)) {
if (playerRights <= 3)
{
update();
}
else
{
sendMessage(“You must be a Owner to weild this haha.”);
remove(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] , playerWeapon);
}
}

and when i lcicked maul it didnt even send message nor equipt…thank you guys for your patients and help

Read full topic

item.title: Need help making an item owner only
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I know what it does.

If you equip it and you don’t have rights 3 or higher, it sends a message and doesnt equip it. If you are though, it will just update();, I just needed something to fill between the { }

Delta- Make it playerRights < 2 then is saying if two is greater than player rights, then they can wear it.

Unless you told him to put that code in the part that makes it so they can;t wear it

Read full topic

item.title: Need help making an item owner only
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

[quote=“Milk and Java™, post:23, topic:172238”]remove(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] , playerWeapon);

That’s why. Do this:

[code]if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4153)) {
if (playerRights <= 3)
{
update();
}
else
{
sendMessage(“You must be a Owner to weild this haha.”);
remove(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] , playerWeapon);
}
}

Let me know what happens.[/code][/quote]

do you have any idea what that code does or did you just post it randomly because it is almost exactly the same thing but you spread it out and made it bigger

Read full topic

item.source: Need help making an item owner only

item.title: Need help making an item owner only
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

[quote=“sordsmen123, post:12, topic:172238”]milk urs have worked best so far actually got some were i did if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4153) && playerRights <= 3) {
sendMessage(“You must be a owner to weild this.”);
} but they were able to weild it would just spam box…[/quote]

if you must use his (delta’s is better) make it like this

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (maul id here) && playerRights <= 0) {
sendMessage("You must be a mod or admin to weild this.");
remove(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] , playerWeapon);
}

although if you wear it and somehow pick something up as you equip it (don’t ask how but could happen) it will delete the item.

if you don’t have void remove add this (ripped from pimpscape)

	public void remove(int wearID, int slot) {
		if(addItem(playerEquipment[slot], playerEquipmentN[slot])) {
                if(wearID == 6070) {
              	npcId = 0;
		isNpc = false;
		updateRequired = true;
		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                }
                        resetItems(3214); // THIS MIGHT STOP CLIENT HACKS HMM?
			playerEquipment[slot] = -1;
			playerEquipmentN[slot] = 0;
			outStream.createFrame(34);
			outStream.writeWord(6);
			outStream.writeWord(1688);
			outStream.writeByte(slot);
			outStream.writeWord(0);
			outStream.writeByte(0);
			ResetBonus();
			GetBonus();
			WriteBonus();
			if (slot == playerWeapon) {
				SendWeapon(-1, "Unarmed");
			}
                        SendWeapon((playerEquipment[playerWeapon]), GetItemName(playerEquipment[playerWeapon]));
			updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
		}
	}

Read full topic
